features.title: The New Standard of Privacy
features.description: Vilka is not just another messenger. It's a fortress for your thoughts, built with uncompromising security features.

cards.title: Quantum-Resistant Encryption
cards.description: Our end-to-end encryption protocol is built to protect against threats of today and tomorrow, safeguarding your data from any attack.

cards.title: Decentralized Network
cards.description: Vilka operates on a P2P network, meaning there are no central servers to store data. Your conversations belong only to you.

cards.title: Complete Anonymity
cards.description: Sign up without a phone number or email. Your identity is never tied to your account, ensuring total privacy.

cards.title: Lightning-Fast Speed
cards.description: Vilka is designed for maximum performance, delivering messages instantly without draining your battery or excess data.

security.title: Security by default, not as a compromise.
security.description: From the very first line of code, Vilka was designed with a zero-trust model. Every message, call, and file is encrypted with its own unique key within a double-ratchet system, providing perfect forward secrecy.

points.text: No Metadata: We don't know who, when, or for how long you communicate.
Open Source: Our code is transparent and regularly audited by independent security experts.
IP Address Masking: Protect your location and identity with built-in onion routing features.

testimonials.title: Trusted by Privacy Experts
